title: If I were to make a channel only for LoL, would it die in a couple of years.
body: Okay, so I know the majority of youtubers made their LoL channel early in the game, trick2g made his channel im 2009 when everyone was joining  LoL. If I were to make a channel now, and keep creating content just LoL, would people get bored? What I'm trying to say it that will the LoL community decrease in the future, then not much people would still be watching Lol videos? What's your opinion on this?

replies.body: Try to make you content unique.
league and the fan base will only rise
I will try my very best, I just have to stay committed at what im doing!

Hmm i have thought about this... I reckon IMO if you made a youtube account now just to feature LOL it will most likely be out done by the bigger channel, but sir if you wish to make a channel I would watch it and good luck if you do try :D

More like it'll be dead for a few years before it gets massive.

It usually takes a long time to build up a big fan base.

Just do it.

If it works then you'll be rich and famous, if it doesn't who cares it was fun.
